full_summary:
### Rotary Grass Lawn Mower and Grooming Mower

#### Tender Title and Reference Number

* Title: Rotary Grass Mower
* Reference Number: WS4320966204-Doc4569559219

#### Tender Information

* Publication Date: May 3, 2024
* Tender Closing Date: May 21, 2024, at 14:00:00
* Tender Status: Expiré (Expired)
* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

#### Notice Details

* Classification: Agriculture, Forestry and Garden Handtools (*27112000)
* Description: The correctional service requires a flexible wing grooming mower for the Matsqui Institution grounds maintenance department.
* Preferred Delivery Date: June 30, 2024
* Date of Arrival: July 31, 2024
* Tender Type: Request for Proposal (Demande de propositions)
* Method of Procurement: Competitive - Open bidding (Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner)
* Evaluation Criteria: Lowest Price (Prix le plus bas)

#### Contact Information

* Name: Samantha Phelan
* Email: samantha.phelan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Notice URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19592405?extsite=MTk1OTI0MDVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

#### Description of Requirement

This tender notice is to purchase a rotary grass lawn mower and grooming mower. The procurement is competitive, open for any interested vendors. The goods must be delivered on or before July 31, 2024. Information regarding the submission process, including contact information and technical specifications, can be found on the provided notice URL. Please contact Samantha Phelan for further information. An evaluation of proposals will start once the tender closes. 

### Evaluation Process
The evaluation process will be based on price criteria. The government entity reserves the right to request product information, including details regarding product and withdrawal sequence performance. The preferred selection outcome will be based on pricing evaluation, lowest price, as the was submitted on the notice declaration. 

Information to submit a proposal has been provided in notice complete in notice HTML page link. Reference the Contact Section as vendor Direction.
